caption.title: AGREE II scaled domain scores of guidelines developed for H1N1, H7N9, MERS-CoV and EVD.
caption.p: EVD, Ebola virus disease; MERS-CoV, Middle East Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus. The AGREE II domains are displayed along the horizontal axis. The data points are the median, interquartile range, and minimum and maximum standardized scores based on the scores of the two reviewers for each domain and outbreak.
